section.p: You realise you have made a mistake. The hut hurtles towards you with frightening speed, and an eerie howling fills the air - Gura Goru, spurring her hut onwards. There is nowhere to run to, and its thorned legs batter you to the ground.
Roll two dice and lose that many Stamina points.
If you are killed, . If you still live, Gura Goru races off, laughing cruelly. .
